name: Control Confusion
description:
Control Confusion starts out as your average top down shooter, but don't let it fool you! Each time your character gets hit, he will get Confused and slowly forget how to Control his own body. Have fun and stay confused :p

-= A GAME BY CRYSTAL MOTH COMPANY =-

This game has been made by 2 competitors, in the Unity game engine, for the GMTK2020 game jam. 
Used assets: TMPro, A* project, menu  and score font, music.
Everything else has been made during the game jam; programming by mr_mirr0r, art and sound design by cresCent.

-= Disclaimer =-
This game cannot be played with a controller. Also, we recommend you use the standard US keyboard layout (QWERTY)
